author: fabiocos
body:
#### PR description:

In this PR a number of xml configuration files for old MTD scenarios no more considered for the supported workflows are removed, to make the data area cleaner and lighter.

#### PR validation:

No file for used scenarios has been touched, the test workflow for scenario D49 runs smoothly, as well as the unit test of ```Geometry/MTDCommonData```.
title: MTD geometry: remove obsolete unused xml configuration files
